prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a scorpion with blue and purple colors.
Generate a Pokemon with sharp pincers and a segmented body, perfect for a desert environment.
Make a small, scorpion-like creature with vibrant teal eyes and a tough exterior.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in caves, featuring a unique blend of purple and white.
Design a creature with an insectoid shape and a defensive combat style.
Show me a Pokemon with a blend of blue and purple, showcasing agile movements.
Give me a Pokemon that can adapt to both urban and natural habitats, with distinct pincers.
